messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Current temp Grand Canyon. I can't read Celsius.

I’m happy to help—just to clarify, are you:

A) Trying to convert a specific temperature you’ve already seen (in °C) into °F?  
or  
B) Asking me to look up the current weather at the Grand Canyon and give it to you in °F?

Let me know which one you need (and, for option A, the temperature you want converted), and I’ll jump right on it.
B) I want to know the current weather at the Grand Canyon in °F.

I’m sorry—I don’t have live-data access to pull the current Grand Canyon weather for you in real time. You can get an up-to-the-minute reading (already shown in °F) by:

• Asking any voice assistant on your phone or smart speaker (“What’s the temperature at the Grand Canyon?”).  
• Typing “Grand Canyon current temperature” into Google or Bing—weather boxes appear at the top.  
• Checking a weather app such as Weather Channel, AccuWeather, or the built-in Weather app on most phones and computers, then searching “Grand Canyon Village, AZ.”

Those sources will show the latest temperature in Fahrenheit, plus humidity, wind, and a forecast.
Okay, I'll try looking it up on my phone, thanks!
You’re welcome! If you need anything else later on—weather or otherwise—just let me know. Have a great day and enjoy your trip to the Grand Canyon!
